title: Heritage Hobart Stay with Daily Breakfast & Guaranteed Room Upgrade
description:
Escape to Tasmania's bustling capital with an elegant stay at The Lodge on Elizabeth, a charming heritage retreat in the heart of Hobart. Sneak away to the grace and grandeur of this stately Georgian mansion and enjoy a relaxing stay in a magical destination packed with world-class art, epicurean discoveries, one-of-a-kind cafés, indulgent wine and cocktail bars and picturesque cobblestone streets, all perched on the edge of a beautiful harbour. When you return to your accommodation after a day of exploring, unwind amidst the greenery of the courtyard garden or mingle with other travellers in the Guest Lounge before retreating to your cosy room, which will surely transport you back in time with its period furnishings and vintage style.

Outside the hotel, you’re just a short stroll away from Hobart’s best restaurants, breweries, cafés and pubs. Along Elizabeth Street, just a five-minute walk away, you can peruse boutique specialty shops or indulge at decadent eateries. Visit Constitution Dock, where you can gaze at the boats dotting the harbour while treating yourself to a glass of wine.

title: Mövenpick City Break near Hobart Waterfront with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Drinks & Chocolate Hour
description:
Throw open the doors to Tasmania's vibrant capital with a stay at Mövenpick Hotel Hobart, an elegant property mere moments from the historic waterfront precinct. Proudly claiming the title of Australia’s first Mövenpick hotel, this urban retreat features a signature Tasmania-inspired design that reflects the island's spectacular natural landscape. Savour antipasti and sumptuous Italian plates at culinary treasure Tesoro, enjoy the hotel's well-equipped fitness centre or indulge at the daily Chocolate Hour, Mövenpick's iconic 60 minutes of deliciousness, offering complimentary daily sweet treats to all guests.

Venture beyond the hotel's doors and explore the charming streets of Tasmania's capital, where cobblestone pathways lead to a treasure trove of trendy eateries, world-class museums, vibrant markets and artisanal micro-breweries. For panoramic views, ascend Kunanyi (Mount Wellington) or embark on a short 20-minute drive to the internationally acclaimed MONA museum, where art and innovation converge.

title: Modern RACV Hobart Stay near Battery Point with Daily Breakfast
description:
Get ready for markets, mountains and MONA with a tempting Tassie stay at RACV Hobart Hotel. Located right in the heart of Tasmania's historic capital, the hotel places you within walking distance of the weekly Salamanca Market, Battery Point and Hobart harbour. You will be perfectly placed for discovering the city, with hikes up Mount Wellington for panoramic views, fresh Tasmanian produce at Hobart's innovative restaurants and head-scratching art at MONA art gallery all within reach.

Stay in a cosy room or spacious family apartment and make the most of convenient onsite facilities, including a fully equipped gym, undercover car park, signature restaurant Charcoal and the atmospheric Cascade on Collins bar, located in the historic Cascade building.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Prepare for days in Hobart with daily breakfast at Charcoal restaurant
- Head to Cascade on Collins for a welcome drink each

**RACV member bonus inclusions:** 

- 12pm late checkout
- Complimentary parking for one vehicle per stay
-  Two in-room movies per stay
- Exclusive member pricing on Hobart and Tasmania attractions through RACV ticketing

**Travelling with friends or family?** Upgrade to the One-Bedroom Apartment for up to two adults and two children (12 and under) or the Family Room package for four guests of any age (an additional two guests may stay; see package for extra guest surcharges).

title: Luxury Boutique Stay On Hobart's Waterfront
description: Experience the lively harbourside charms of Hobart with a stay at the boutique The Henry Jones Art Hotel, located in the iconic Hunter Street precinct, minutes away from all of the city's attractions. Enjoy delicious daily à la carte breakfast, a bottle of Tasmanian wine waiting in your room, an exclusive jar of The Henry Jones Art Hotel jam, complimentary parking and a leisurely late guaranteed checkout at 12pm.

title: Harbourside Luxury with Daily Breakfast and The Best Views in Hobart
description: Experience the history, natural beauty and lively vibe of Hobart staying at Wrest Point with Tasmania's best viewing deck. Enjoy daily, sky-high breakfast at The Point Revolving Restaurant, a welcome drink on arrival, AU$50 credit to be spent on food and drinks at the hotel’s restaurants and bars, a leisurely late 1pm check-out and the most sublime views in Tasmania.

title: Brand-New Stay in the Heart of Hobart with Room Upgrade & Daily Breakfast
description:
Stay in the heart of Hobart’s buzzing waterfront at its newest hotel, Pure T Hotel, where you’re within easy reach of the city’s best restaurants, coolest bars, buzzing markets and cultural hotspots. Enjoy shiny new facilities at this recently renovated property, plus a stellar location in the CBD’s dining precinct.

When you’re not wining and dining in the city, Tasmania’s wonders are easily reached by car: drive (or hike) to the top of Kunanyi/Mt Wellington to admire sweeping city views, enjoy a tour and a pint at Cascade Brewery and check out the weird and wonderful exhibitions at MONA.

title: Comfortable Hobart Airport Stay with Daily Breakfast
description: With a convenient location just a three-minute drive from Hobart Airport, Travelodge Hotel Hobart Airport offers comfortable accommodation between jet-setting adventures. Between flights, take a breezy day trip up to Wineglass Bay or down to Port Arthur and marvel at coastal views and historic facades. Fuel up for the day with a tasty breakfast in the hotel’s contemporary dining space before wandering the city, or even exploring the Barilla Bay Oyster Farm nearby. Enjoy an easy shuttle transfer from the airport, and lounge in your cosy room, planning your next Hobart adventure.

title: Waterfront Luxury in Hobart’s #1 Hotel with Exclusive Inclusions
description: Discover the charms of Tasmania with a luxury stay at MACq 01 Hotel - one of Australia’s hottest hotels of the moment with its world-class cuisine, stylish rooms and unparalleled waterfront views. Enjoy a two-night stay at this luxury storytelling property with daily full buffet breakfast, a welcome drink on arrival, local chocolates, unlimited in-room movies, valet parking included and most importantly, uniquely Tasmanian storytelling tours of the Hotel and the Hobart waterfront.

title: Vibe Hotel Hobart Moments from the Harbour with Daily Breakfast & Welcome Drinks
description:
Fall in love with the Apple Isle's many charms at Vibe Hotel Hobart, a unique property just a short walk from the harbour with a storied past. While its towering exterior and sleek interiors are modern and sophisticated, the hotel’s history dates to the 1930s, when it was better known as the Belvedere Ballroom. That swinging spirit lives on at the onsite Belvedere restaurant, where black-and-white photographs pay homage to the site’s dancing days. Fuel up for the day with fresh Tasmanian produce showcasing paddock and ocean fare and uncover Vibe Hotel Hobart’s fascinating past.

When you're ready for adventure, the very best of Tassie's capital is within easy walking distance. Stroll to the harbourfront, where Salamanca Market buzzes with tourists and locals every Saturday, or catch the ferry from Constitution Dock to MONA, Hobart's most eclectic art gallery - home to interactive exhibitions, fine dining and even a winery. At the end of each day, Vibe's impeccable hospitality, mountain views and stunning fifth-floor heated pool are waiting to welcome you home.

title: Mövenpick City Break near Hobart Waterfront with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Drinks & Chocolate Hour
description:
Throw open the doors to Tasmania's vibrant capital with a stay at Mövenpick Hotel Hobart, an elegant property mere moments from the historic waterfront precinct. Proudly claiming the title of Australia’s first Mövenpick hotel, this urban retreat features a signature Tasmania-inspired design that reflects the island's spectacular natural landscape. Savour antipasti and sumptuous Italian plates at culinary treasure Tesoro, enjoy the hotel's well-equipped fitness centre or indulge at the daily Chocolate Hour, Mövenpick's iconic 60 minutes of deliciousness, offering complimentary daily sweet treats to all guests.

When you need a change of scenery, step outside the hotel to weave your way through cobblestone streets and uncover the quaint charms of Tasmania’s capital. Take time to visit the many trendy eateries, renowned museums and galleries, bustling markets and micro-breweries, discover phenomenal mountain vistas at the summit of Kunanyi (Mount Wellington) or drive just 20 minutes to the internationally acclaimed MONA Museum of Old and New Art.

title: Hobart Harbourfront Heritage Apartment Escape Moments from Salamanca Market
description:
Treat yourself to a taste of Tasmania at Somerset on the Pier Hobart - a waterfront oasis where old-world charm meets modern comforts. Housed in a beautifully converted 1930s pier building, this Hobart icon boasts a collection of contemporary apartments that are both spacious and stylish, with each offering serene vistas of the surrounding mountainscape or marina. With Salamanca Market and the MONA (Museum of Old and New Art) ferry on your doorstep, you'll be perfectly located to explore the very best of Hobart or to simply soak up the views with a glass of Tasmanian wine.

Whether you're seeking a serene staycation on the shores of the Derwent or looking for the perfect place to base yourself for adventure, this is the ideal retreat for every traveller. After you’ve explored everything on your list, enjoy a well-deserved drink at The Lounge by Frogmore Creek, perfectly paired with a charcuterie board housing the best local produce.

title: Mövenpick City Break near Hobart Waterfront with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Drinks & Chocolate Hour
description:
Throw open the doors to Tasmania's vibrant capital with a stay at Mövenpick Hotel Hobart, a luxury property mere moments from the historic waterfront precinct. Proudly claiming the title of Australia’s first Mövenpick hotel, this urban retreat is backed by a signature Tasmanian-inspired design that reflects the island's spectacular natural landscape. Savour antipasti and sumptuous Italian plates at culinary treasure Tesoro, enjoy the hotel's well-equipped fitness centre or indulge at the daily Chocolate Hour, Mövenpick's iconic sixty minutes of deliciousness known throughout the world.

When you need a change of scenery, step outside the hotel to weave your way through cobblestoned streets and uncover the quaint charms of Tasmania’s capital. Take time to visit the many trendy eateries, renowned museums and galleries, bustling markets and micro-breweries, discover phenomenal mountain vistas at the summit of Kunanyi or drive just 20-minutes to the internationally acclaimed Museum of Old and New Art.

title: Contemporary RACV Stay in the Heart of Historic Hobart with Daily Breakfast
description:
Get ready for markets, mountains and MONA with a tempting Tassie stay at RACV Hobart Hotel. Located right in the heart of Tasmania's historic capital, the hotel places you within walking distance of the weekly Salamanca Market, Battery Point and Hobart harbour. 

Take hikes up Mount Wellington for panoramic views, indulge in fresh Tasmanian produce at Hobart's innovative restaurants, and view innovative art at MONA art gallery. This heritage-meets-modern hotel boasts facilities including a modern gym and undercover car park. When you're feeling peckish, head to the signature restaurant Charcoal for fresh seafood and award-winning local Tasmanian wine, and the atmospheric Cascade on Collins bar in the historic Cascade building for a classic cocktail and light bites.

title: Hobart Apartment Escape with Daily Breakfast
description: Discover the treasures of Hobart and enjoy the flexibility of a private apartment at the RACV/RACT Hobart Apartment Hotel, located near the famous Salamanca Market. A bottle of Tasmanian red wine on arrival will provide a pleasant start to your escape, which also includes daily buffet breakfast, complimentary Wi-Fi and a guaranteed late 12 noon checkout. Two kids (aged 12 years and under) stay free on a sofa bed with daily breakfast.

title: Vibe Hotel Hobart Moments from the Harbour with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Fall in love with the Apple Isle's many charms at Vibe Hotel Hobart, a unique property just a short walk from the harbour with a storied past. While its towering exterior and sleek interiors are modern and sophisticated, the hotel’s history dates to the 1930s, when it was better known as the Belvedere Ballroom. That swinging spirit lives on at the onsite Belvedere restaurant, where black-and-white photographs pay homage to the site’s dancing days. Fuel up for the day with fresh Tasmanian produce showcasing paddock and ocean fare and uncover Vibe Hotel Hobart’s fascinating past.

When you're ready for adventure, the very best of Tasmania's capital is within easy walking distance. Stroll to the harbourfront, where Salamanca Market buzzes with tourists and locals every Saturday, or catch the ferry from Constitution Dock to MONA, Hobart's most eclectic art gallery - home to interactive exhibitions, fine dining and even a winery. At the end of each day, Vibe Hotel Hobart's impeccable hospitality, cosy Dreamcatcher beds and stunning fifth-floor heated pool are waiting to welcome you home.

title: Bestselling Hobart Stay Moments from the Harbour with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Discover the allure of Tasmania by immersing yourself in the distinctive ambience of this remarkable property, conveniently located just a brief stroll from the harbour. Though its impressive facade and contemporary interiors exude modernity and elegance, the hotel's roots trace back to the 1930s, when it was renowned as the Belvedere Ballroom. That swinging spirit lives on at the onsite Belvedere restaurant, where black-and-white photographs pay homage to the site’s dancing days. Fuel up for the day with fresh Tasmanian produce showcasing paddock and ocean fare.

When you're ready for adventure, the very best of Tasmania's capital is within easy walking distance. Stroll to the harbourfront, where Salamanca Market buzzes every Saturday, or catch the ferry from Constitution Dock to MONA, Hobart's most eclectic art gallery. At the end of each day, Vibe Hotel Hobart's impeccable hospitality, cosy cloud-like beds and stunning fifth-floor heated pool are waiting to welcome you home.

title: Central Hobart City Break Overlooking the Harbour with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description: Escape to Tasmania's bustling harbour town with a stay at the contemporary-chic ibis Styles Hobart. The largest and brightest hotel in the capital's CBD, this colourful escape has everything you need for a sensational stay: laze by the indoor heated pool, warm up in your choice of two saunas and rehydrate with a cocktail and an evening of South East Asian flavours at the Mr. Good Guy restaurant and bar. During the day, venture further afield to find some of the state's very best restaurants and food producers. Fancy some culture? MONA is just a 20-minute drive away.

title: Boutique Hobart Apartment Escape on Salamanca Wharf with Daily Breakfast
description:
You couldn't ask for a better location from which to explore the cobbled charm of Hobart than the acclaimed Salamanca Wharf Hotel. Located just a stone's throw from the famed waterfront on Castray Esplanade - Tasmania’s single most-visited tourism precinct - the hotel offers modern comforts while staying true to the rich history of the area. Inside, you'll find custom-made Tasmanian timber furniture, fully equipped kitchens in every room and Laurent Dick artwork that honours Tasmania’s ties as the gateway to Antarctica.

Meanwhile, on your doorstep is the Salamanca precinct, a thriving arts community and the cultural heart of Hobart. For local produce and crafts, don't miss Salamanca Market, where there are multiple high-end restaurants for epicureans to choose from.
offer_address: 17A Castray Esplanade, Battery Point, Hobart TAS 7004

title: Contemporary RACV Stay in the Heart of Historic Hobart with Daily Breakfast & Dining Credit
description:
Get ready for markets, mountains and MONA with a tempting Tassie stay at RACV Hobart Hotel. Located right in the heart of Tasmania's historic capital, within walking distance of the weekly Salamanca Market, Battery Point and Hobart Harbour, this heritage-meets-modern hotel is perfectly placed for exploring. Hike up Mount Wellington for panoramic views, indulge in fresh Tasmanian produce at innovative restaurants and observe head-scratching art at MONA art gallery.

Between adventures, head to the hotel's signature restaurant, Charcoal, for fresh seafood and award-winning local Tasmanian wine, or the atmospheric Cascade on Collins bar in the historic Cascade building, for a classic cocktail and light bites.

title: Newly Renovated Hobart Retreat near Salamanca Market with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Get ready for markets, mountains and the Museum of Old and New Art (MONA) with a tempting Tassie stay at a hotel where heritage meets the modern day. Located right in the heart of Tasmania's heritage capital and within walking distance of the weekly Salamanca Market, Battery Point and Hobart Harbour, this serene hotel is perfectly placed for exploring.

This urban retreat features a signature Tasmania-inspired design that reflects the island's spectacular natural landscape. Enjoy the hotel's impeccable hospitality before retreating to cosy cloud-like beds in new look rooms.

Between adventures, head to the hotel's signature restaurant, Charcoal, for fresh produce showcasing paddock and ocean fare as well as award-winning local Tasmanian wine, or the atmospheric Cascade on Collins in the heritage Cascade building for a classic cocktail and light bites.

Venture beyond the hotel's doors and explore the charming streets of Tasmania's capital, where cobblestone pathways lead to a treasure trove of trendy eateries, vibrant markets and artisanal micro-breweries. Hike up kunanyi (Mount Wellington) for panoramic views, indulge in fresh Tasmanian produce at innovative restaurants and observe modern art at MONA.

title: Central Hobart Stay near Salamanca Market with Daily Breakfast
description: Discover the best of Hobart - Tasmania's small but mighty capital city offering up something for everyone. From your comfortable base, head out on foot to find lush landscapes, seasonal markets, the beautiful waterfront precinct and, of course, Hobart's incredible dining scene. Fuel up for the day with tasty breakfast and coffee in the hotel’s contemporary dining space before wandering the city, or even exploring lookouts at stunning Mount Wellington nearby. Stretch out in the onsite yoga studio or spend your downtime lazing in your room, planning your next Hobart adventure.

vendor_name: The Tasman, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Hobart
title: Waterfront Hobart Escape with Daily Breakfast & Welcome Drinks (select packages only)
description: DO Not Use
location_description: The Tasman, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Hobart

title: Hobart Waterfront Escape with Daily Breakfast & A$50 Dining Credit
description:
Immerse yourself in the spectacular natural beauty of Tasmania and discover the many charms of its capital from the perfectly positioned Hotel Grand Chancellor Hobart - a renowned waterfront hotel in the heart of Hobart. Soak up spectacular views of the River Derwent from an unbeatable location minutes from the city’s main attractions, including Salamanca Place (home to the famous Salamanca Market) and Battery Point.

Your Tassie escape for two includes daily breakfast, A$50 dining credit per room, a welcome drink each, secure parking throughout your stay and a leisurely 12pm checkout.

**Travelling with kids?** Pick the Family Upgrade for two adults and two children (aged 12 years and under).

title: New Dates Added: Hobart Grand Opening Heritage Escape with Daily À La Carte Breakfast
description:
**New dates added, available for a limited time only**

Experience the charms of harbour-front Hobart at one of the city's newest additions: Vibe Hotel Hobart. Scoring five-star reviews on Tripadvisor since its opening in December 2020, this unique hotel has an interesting story to tell. While its towering exterior (offering beautiful harbour and mountain views) and sleek interiors may be brand new, its history dates back to the 1930s, when it was better known as the Belvedere Ballroom. Its swinging soul lives on at the Belvedere restaurant, where Art Deco touches and black-and-white images pay homage to its dancing days. Taste fresh Tasmanian produce showcasing paddock and seashore fare and immerse yourself in the building's fascinating past.

When you're ready for adventure, the very best of Tassie's capital is within easy walking distance. Stroll to the harbourfront, where the Salamanca Market buzzes with tourists and locals every Saturday, or catch the ferry from Constitution Dock to MONA, Hobart's most eclectic art gallery - home to interactive exhibitions, fine dining and even a winery. At the end of each day, Vibe's impeccable hospitality, cosy Dreamcatcher beds and stunning fifth-floor heated pool are waiting to welcome you home.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Begin each day with paddock-to-plate à la carte breakfast at Belvedere
- Get off to a great start with a glass of wine or beer on arrival
- Let the good times roll on with 1pm late checkout

**Travelling with family?** Choose the Family Upgrade with interconnecting rooms for two adults and two children (aged 11 years and under).

**Want a room with a view?** Upgrade to wake up to breathtaking mountain vistas in the spacious Mountain View King Room or choose the Harbour View King Room to be treated to revitalising harbour views.

**Suite upgrade available**: For those who desire extra space, the Deluxe Suite delivers with a separate lounge area and Hobart harbour views.

**Upgrade and longer stay bonuses:** Receive A$30 drinks and dining credit per package plus a cheese plate and glass of wine with select packages.

title: Stylish Stay in the Heart of Hobart with Daily Breakfast
description:
Experience the historic charm of Hobart with a stay at the modern, self-contained Old Woolstore Apartment Hotel. The hotel's enviable location, close to the waterfront and some of the city's best attractions, ensures you'll be perfectly placed to enjoy all that Hobart has to offer. Enjoy a two-night stay with daily breakfast, a decadent antipasto plate to share, a welcome drink on arrival and a guaranteed late 12pm checkout so you can make the most of your final morning.

**Travelling with Family or Friends?** For a truly unforgettable escape, upgrade to a spacious Two Bedroom Apartment.

title: Experience Australia's First Dedicated Art Hotel on Hobart’s Waterfront
description: Embrace the history, natural beauty and lively vibe of Hobart with a stay at the boutique The Henry Jones Art Hotel, ideally positioned in the iconic Hunter Street precinct and housed in the city’s oldest waterfront warehouses. Make the best of your stay with daily à la carte breakfast, a bottle of Tasmanian wine on arrival, an exclusive jar of The Henry Jones Art Hotel jam, complimentary parking and Wi-Fi connection throughout your stay, and a leisurely late guaranteed checkout at 12pm.

title: Tasmania: Discover One of Australia’s Hottest Hotels
description: Tasmania is trending and MACq 01 Hotel is one of Australia’s hottest hotels of the moment with its world-class cuisine, stylish rooms and suites, and waterfront views. Enjoy a two-night stay at this luxury storytelling property with daily continental buffet breakfast, a welcome drink on arrival, local chocolates and unlimited in-room movies included.

title: Boutique Apartment Stay in the Heart of Hobart’s Salamanca Place
description: Experience the historic charm of Hobart with a getaway at the award-winning Salamanca Wharf Hotel. Enjoy a guaranteed upgrade to a Premium One-Bedroom Apartment and a perfect location in popular Salamanca, home to buzzing restaurants and bars. Included in your escape is a complimentary bottle of sparkling Tasmanian wine on arrival, two tickets to the famous MONA art gallery, a Tasmanian cheese platter to share and a late 1pm check-out.

title: Boutique Stay in the Heart of Hobart's Salamanca Place
description:
Experience the charms of Tasmania from Moss Hotel, a stylish city retreat hidden away within the original warehouses above bustling Salamanca Place. The latest addition to Hobart’s boutique hotels, this luxury cocoon is set in an unbeatable location, steps from everything the city has to offer.

Your luxe escape includes a bottle of Tasmanian sparkling wine on arrival, a cheese platter with local products and fine cheeses, a guaranteed leisurely 1pm late checkout and an exclusive Experience Passport with local discounts and special offers.

title: Modern Apartment Escape in the Heart of Hobart with Daily Breakfast
description:
Discover the treasures of Hobart and enjoy the flexibility of a modern apartment with kitchenette at the RACV/RACT Hobart Apartment Hotel, located in an unbeatable location near Hobart's most iconic attractions. A bottle of Australian red wine on arrival will provide the perfect start to your escape, which also includes daily breakfast and a guaranteed late 12pm checkout. Plus, if you're an RACV or RACT member, you'll enjoy extra perks such as Coal River Farm chocolates on arrival, one in-room movie per stay and exclusive member pricing on Hobart and Tasmania attractions through RACV tickets.

**Travelling with family?** Two children aged 12 years and under stay free (see Fine Print for details).

title: Heritage-Listed Stay in the Heart of Hobart with Daily Breakfast
description:
Escape to Tasmania's historic capital with a stylish stay at the heritage-listed Rydges Hobart - a charming retreat within walking distance of the weekly Salamanca Market by the waterfront. Located in the heart of trendy North Hobart, there's plenty of food, drink and nightlife to explore at your doorstep. This magical destination promises a relaxing escape packed with world-class art, epicurean discoveries, one-of-a-kind cafes, indulgent wine and cocktail bars and picturesque cobblestone streets, all perched on the edge of the beautiful harbour.

If you prefer to relax within the comforts of the hotel, warm yourself by the fire at the 1898 Restaurant & Bar, set within the historical main building, and indulge in authentic Tasmanian fare of local, seasonal produce, with sparkling views of the Hobart skyline.
offer_address: 393 Argyle Street, North Hobart, Tasmania 7000, Australia

title: Grand Opening: Discover Hobart’s Newest Hotel in the Heart of Salamanca Place
description: Experience Hobart’s charms from a chic, brand-new launchpad, concealed within original warehouses in bustling Salamanca Place. The newly opened Moss Hotel is already the name on everyone’s lips. The newest addition to Hobart’s boutique hotels, this luxury cocoon is in an unbeatable location, steps away from everything the city has on offer. Your boutique escape includes a bottle of Tasmanian sparkling wine on arrival, a cheese platter with local products and fine cheeses, a guaranteed, leisurely late 1pm check-out and an exclusive Experience Passport with local discounts and special offers.

title: Adults-Only Boutique Hobart Retreat with Spectacular Mount Wellington Views & Daily Breakfast
description: Built in 1847, the Islington Hotel's historic charm and cosy vibes offer the perfect place to rejuvenate surrounded by picture-perfect Mount Wellington views, precious artworks, crackling fires and sundrenched terraces. Indulge your love of gourmet food and try something off the seasonal menu offered on-site. Homemade is best made according to the Islington's Kitchen, where organic and local produce is cooked with love and to perfection. Sample delicious produce during your daily breakfast and cheese-laden welcome gift. Experience the grandeur, natural beauty and charm for yourself in a location just walking distance from Sullivans Cove and near the vibrant live music scene, dramatic art galleries and gourmet dining options of Hobart.

title: Contemporary RACV Stay in the Heart of Historic Hobart with Daily Breakfast & Welcome Wine
description:
Get ready for markets, mountains and MONA with a tempting Tassie stay at a hotel where heritage meets the modern day. Located right in the heart of Tasmania's historic capital, within walking distance of the weekly Salamanca Market, Battery Point and Hobart Harbour, RACV Hobart Hotel is perfectly placed for exploring. Venture beyond the hotel's doors and explore the charming streets of Tasmania's capital, where cobblestone pathways lead to a treasure trove of trendy eateries, world-class museums, vibrant markets and artisanal micro-breweries. Hike up Mount Wellington for panoramic views, indulge in fresh Tasmanian produce at innovative restaurants and observe head-scratching art at MONA - Museum of Old and New Art.

Between adventures, head to the hotel's signature restaurant, Charcoal, for fresh produce showcasing paddock and ocean fare and award-winning local Tasmanian wine, or the atmospheric Cascade on Collins bar in the historic Cascade building, for a classic cocktail and light bites. This urban retreat features a signature Tasmania-inspired design that reflects the island's spectacular natural landscape. Enjoy the hotel's well-equipped fitness centre and impeccable hospitality, before retreating to cosy cloud-like beds in new look rooms.

title: Boutique Apartment Stay in the Heart of Hobart’s Salamanca Place
description: Experience the historic charm of Hobart with a stay at the award-winning Salamanca Wharf Hotel. Enjoy a guaranteed upgrade to a Premium One-Bedroom Apartment and a central location in popular Salamanca, home to buzzing restaurants and bars. Make the most of your escape with daily breakfast, a complimentary bottle of sparkling Tasmanian wine on arrival and a late 1pm checkout.
offer_address: 17A Castray Esplanade, Battery Point, Hobart TAS 7004

title: Salamanca Wharf Boutique Apartment Escape with Daily Breakfast
description:
Just a stone's throw from Hobart's waterfront you'll find the boutique Salamanca Wharf Hotel, ranked within the top 10% of properties worldwide on Tripadvisor. Located on Castray Esplanade, Tasmania’s single most visited tourism precinct, the hotel offers a modern escape while staying true to the rich history of the area.

Inside, you'll find custom-made Tasmanian timber furniture, fully equipped kitchens in every room, and Laurent Dick artwork to honour Tasmania’s ties as the gateway to Antarctica. Meanwhile, on your doorstep is the Salamanca precinct, a thriving arts community and the cultural heart of Hobart. Don't miss the Salamanca Market featuring local produce and crafts, and for gourmands, there are multiple high-end restaurants to choose from. If you're looking for a quieter pace, take a stroll through the picturesque Princes Park for both beautiful scenery and the historic sites of Battery Point.
offer_address: 17A Castray Esplanade, Battery Point, Hobart TAS 7004

title: Contemporary City Break in the Heart of Historic Hobart with Daily Breakfast
description:
Get ready to explore the Tasmanian capital with a central stylish stay at Best Western Hobart. Located right in the heart of historic Hobart, the hotel places you within walking distance of the weekly Salamanca Market, Battery Point and Hobart Harbour. Iconic museum MONA, Cascade Brewery and Bellerive Oval remain within easy reach, making it the perfect base for enjoying the best of the southern city.

Recently unveiling a million-dollar renovation, Best Western Hobart has combined heritage charm with modern facilities. Local artwork dots the communal areas, setting the tone for the 140 re-decorated rooms, all of which have views of the city below or picturesque Mount Wellington. Boasting a modern gym and undercover car park, as well as a stylish cocktail lounge, it's the ideal launchpad for exploring the Tassie capital.

title: City Escape in the Heart of Hobart with Daily Breakfast
description: Experience the lively harbour-side charms of Hobart with a two, three or five-night getaway at Mantra Collins Hotel, located only minutes from famous Franklin Wharf and close to the city's main tourist attractions. Includes daily à la carte breakfast, a bottle of local Tasmanian wine on arrival, late 12pm checkout and complimentary Wi-Fi.

title: Central Hobart City Break near Salamanca Place with Daily Breakfast, Chocolate Hour & Nightly Drinks
description:
Appreciate the charm of Tasmania’s capital at this modern hotel, where vibrant city life meets heritage allure. 

Perfectly positioned in the heart of Hobart, this sophisticated escape places you just a short stroll from the bustling waterfront and cobblestone streets of Salamanca Place, home to lively markets, galleries and charming cafes.

Step into a world of comfort and style with contemporary rooms offering sumptuous bedding and sweeping city or harbour views. Start your mornings with a leisurely breakfast at Tesoro Modern Italian Restaurant - the hotel’s restaurant where local Tasmanian produce melds with bold Italian flavours - before exploring Hobart’s hidden gems. Return for Mövenpick’s famous Chocolate Hour because every stay deserves a little indulgence. 

After a day of adventure, recharge at the well-equipped fitness centre, enjoy a drink at Tesoro Modern Italian Restaurant or simply unwind on your cosy bed.

title: Charming Heritage-Listed Stay in the Heart of Hobart with Daily Breakfast
description: Experience Tasmania's historic capital with a stylish stay at this heritage-listed retreat, situated within walking distance of Salamanca Market and the vibrant waterfront. Nestled in the heart of trendy North Hobart, Rydges Hobart boasts antique suites and manicured gardens and offers a unique blend of historic charm and modern comfort. Revel in a relaxing escape packed with world-class art, epicurean discoveries, one-of-a-kind cafes, indulgent wine and cocktail bars and picturesque cobblestone streets, all perched on the edge of the beautiful harbour. If you prefer to relax within the comforts of the hotel, warm yourself by the fire at the 1898 Restaurant & Bar, set within the historical main building, and indulge in authentic Tasmanian fare with sparkling views of the Hobart skyline.
offer_address: 393 Argyle Street, North Hobart, Tasmania 7000, Australia

title: Heritage-Listed Hobart Stay with Wine & Cheese Platter
description:
Romance abounds in Tasmania's historic capital, Hobart. Discover everything it has to offer with a stylish stay at the heritage-listed Rydges Hobart - a charming retreat featuring a bar, restaurant and complimentary parking - within walking distance of the weekly waterfront Salamanca Market.

Sneak away for a relaxing escape in a magical destination packed with world-class art, epicurean discoveries, one-of-a-kind cafés, indulgent wine and cocktail bars, and picturesque cobblestone streets, all perched on the edge of a beautiful harbour.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Arrive to a welcome drink each at 1898 Bar
- Indulge with one complimentary bottle of Tasmanian wine and a cheese platter
- Enjoy a final morning exploring with guaranteed 1pm late checkout
- Up to two children aged 11 and under stay free (accommodation only)

**Travelling with family or friends?** Choose The Trust Cottage Suite upgrade. Heritage-listed by the National Trust of Australia, this spacious cottage has two identical sides, making it ideal for travelling families or friends (packages valid for two adults. Up to two children stay free or up to two additional adult guests may stay for a surcharge - see individual package for details).

**Longer stay bonus**: Stay three nights or more and receive A$10 food and drink credit per package, per day.
offer_address: 393 Argyle Street, North Hobart, Tasmania 7000, Australia

title: Charming Self-Contained Heritage Apartments in the Heart of Hobart with Breakfast Hamper
description:
Step into a realm of boutique luxury in these heritage apartments, nestled in the historic suburb of Battery Point in Hobart. Each self-contained apartment is thoughtfully equipped with contemporary comforts, including oversized rain showers and sleek, modern kitchens. Combining heritage charm with modern sophistication, upgrade to the three-bedroom Sussex House to enjoy lavish furnishings, a cosy fireplace and plenty of space.

Perfectly situated near the vibrant heart of Hobart, this elegant retreat is within walking distance of iconic attractions including the Salamanca Market, Tasmanian Museum & Art Gallery and Parliament House Gardens. Between savouring freshly caught seafood, exploring art galleries or strolling through picturesque laneways, consider venturing further afield. Embark on a Bruny Island or Wineglass Bay cruise to immerse yourself in Tasmania’s natural beauty.

title: Hobart’s #1 Hotel: Top-Rated Heritage Lodge with Daily Breakfast
description:
Old-world charm meets modern luxury at Maylands Lodge in Hobart - currently rated the #1 hotel in the city on Tripadvisor. Stay on the northern fringes of the capital in one of Tasmania's most significant heritage properties, dating back to 1887. With the city centre just a short drive away, this heavenly escape places you close to top-notch restaurants, vibrant bars, impressive galleries and museums, with enough distance to feel as if you’re worlds away from the everyday.

The interior reveals an elegant fusion of rich textures, with Tasmanian timber accents set against striking Victorian architectural features. Dramatic winding staircases, stained glass and grand arches pay homage to the building’s rich history, while seamlessly blending with modern touches like dark marble and luxury amenities. Stretching over three expansive levels, the lodge offers guests cosy sitting rooms with crackling fireplaces and views that stretch across Hobart to Mount Wellington. When you need a bite to eat, Restaurant Deodara is where you will find hyper-seasonal produce grown from the gardens that surround the lodge.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Start your day the right way with daily à la carte breakfast at Restaurant Deodara
- Grab a glass and enjoy a welcome bottle of Tasmanian wine on arrival
- Indulge with a cheeseboard in-room to welcome you to the lodge

title: Heritage-Listed Hobart Stay with Wine & Cheese Platter
description: Romance abounds in Tasmania's historic capital, Hobart. Discover everything it has to offer with a stylish retreat at the Heritage-listed Rydges Hobart. Sneak away for a relaxing escape in a magical destination packed with world-class art, epicurean discoveries, one-of-a-kind cafés, indulgent wine and cocktail bars, and picturesque cobblestone streets, all perched on the edge of a beautiful harbour. Enjoy a welcome drink served at 1898 Bar, a bottle of wine served with a delicious cheese platter and a leisurely guaranteed 1pm checkout.
offer_address: 393 Argyle Street, North Hobart, Tasmania 7000, Australia

title: Central Hobart City Break Overlooking the Harbour with Heated Pool & Complimentary Drink
description:
Escape to Tasmania's bustling harbour town with a comfortable stay at the contemporary-chic ibis Styles Hobart. Known as the largest and brightest hotel in the capital's CBD, this colourful escape has everything you need for a sensational stay: laze by the indoor heated pool, warm up in your choice of two saunas and rehydrate with a cocktail and an evening of Southeast Asian flavours at Mr. Good Guy Restaurant and Bar.

During the day, venture further afield to find some of the state's very best restaurants and food producers including Templo, Frank and Fico. Fancy some culture? The world-renowned MONA is just a 20-minute drive away, where you can check out the latest boundary-pushing art. Interested in harbourside entertainment? Wander down to the water's edge and explore the dining, arts and culture precinct overlooking the sparkling harbour.

title: Hobart Boutique Apartment Escape on Salamanca Wharf with Guaranteed Upgrade
description:
You couldn't ask for a better location from which to experience the cobbled charm of Hobart than the acclaimed Salamanca Wharf Hotel. Located just a stone's throw from the famed waterfront on Castray Esplanade - Tasmania’s single most-visited tourism precinct - the hotel offers modern comforts while staying true to the rich history of the area. Inside, you'll find custom-made Tasmanian timber furniture, fully equipped kitchens in every room, and Laurent Dick artwork that honours Tasmania’s ties as the gateway to Antarctica. 

Meanwhile, on your doorstep is the Salamanca precinct, a thriving arts community and the cultural heart of Hobart. For local produce and crafts, don't miss Salamanca Market, where there are multiple high-end restaurants for gourmands to choose from. If you're looking for a quieter pace, take a stroll through the picturesque Princes Park for both beautiful scenery and the historic sites of Battery Point.
offer_address: 17A Castray Esplanade, Battery Point, Hobart TAS 7004

title: Heritage-Listed Stay in the Heart of Hobart with Wine & Cheese Plate
description: Escape to Tasmania's historic capital with a stylish stay at the heritage-listed Rydges Hobart - a charming retreat within walking distance of the weekly waterfront Salamanca Market. Sneak away for a relaxing escape in a magical destination packed with world-class art, epicurean discoveries, one-of-a-kind cafés, indulgent wine and cocktail bars, and picturesque cobblestone streets, all perched on the edge of a beautiful harbour. When you return after a day of exploring, dine at 1898 Restaurant and Bar, set within the historically-listed main building with a fireplace and courtyard.
offer_address: 393 Argyle Street, North Hobart, Tasmania 7000, Australia

title: Boutique Apartments in Hobart’s Salamanca Place
description: Experience the historic charm of Hobart with a two-night getaway to the award-winning Salamanca Wharf Hotel. Enjoy a guaranteed upgrade to a Premium One-Bedroom Apartment, daily AU$25 breakfast vouchers each to enjoy at the onsite Salamanca Wharf Café, a complimentary bottle of sparkling Tasmanian wine on arrival and a late 1pm checkout for two.

title: Central Hobart Stay near Salamanca Market with Daily Breakfast
description: Conveniently located just minutes from the city centre, Travelodge Hotel Hobart provides a comfortable base to relax in after days spent exploring Tasmania’s capital. Easily explore the city’s exciting dining scene, seasonal markets and beautiful waterfront precinct on foot. Fuel up for the day with tasty breakfast and coffee in the hotel’s contemporary morning dining space before wandering the city, or even exploring lookouts at stunning Mount Wellington nearby. Pump some iron in the hotel's fully-equipped gym, stretch in the yoga studio or spend your downtime lazing in your room, planning your next Hobart adventure.

title: Vibe Hotel Hobart Heritage Luxury with Daily Breakfast & Welcome Drinks
description:
Experience the charms of Hobart at Vibe Hotel Hobart, a unique new hotel just a short walk from the harbour with an interesting story to tell. While its towering exterior (offering beautiful harbour and mountain views) and sleek interiors may be brand new, its history dates back to the 1930s, when it was better known as the Belvedere Ballroom. Its swinging soul lives on at the Belvedere restaurant, where Art Deco touches and black-and-white images pay homage to the site’s dancing days. Taste fresh Tasmanian produce showcasing paddock and ocean fare and immerse yourself in the building's fascinating past.

When you're ready for adventure, the very best of Tassie's capital is within easy walking distance. Stroll to the harbourfront, where Salamanca Market buzzes with tourists and locals every Saturday, or catch the ferry from Constitution Dock to MONA, Hobart's most eclectic art gallery - home to interactive exhibitions, fine dining and even a winery. At the end of each day, Vibe's impeccable hospitality, cosy Dreamcatcher beds and stunning fifth-floor heated pool are waiting to welcome you home.

title: Award-Winning Retreat with Spectacular Mount Wellington Views
description: As Tasmania’s most awarded hotel, this Hobart gem makes for a serene getaway suited for romance and relaxation. Built in 1847, the Islington Hotel's historic charm and cosy vibes offer the perfect place to rejuvenate surrounded by antiques and precious artworks. The estate itself is abundant with sweeping gardens and glorious mountain views. Enjoy daily home-cooked breakfasts with house-made sausages, pastries and more provided for your pleasure. Sample delicious gourmet produce with a gift pack including a bottle of Tasmanian Pinot wine and house-made nuts, candy, preserves and local honey. A late checkout of 12pm is guaranteed along with an in-room iPad and Wi-Fi.

title: Vibe Hotel Hobart Moments from the Harbour with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Fall in love with the Apple Isle's many charms at Vibe Hotel Hobart, a unique property just a short walk from the harbour with a storied past. While its towering exterior and sleek interiors are modern and sophisticated, the hotel’s history dates to the 1930s, when it was better known as the Belvedere Ballroom. That swinging spirit lives on at the onsite Belvedere restaurant, where black-and-white photographs pay homage to the site’s dancing days. Fuel up for the day with fresh Tasmanian produce showcasing paddock and ocean fare and uncover Vibe Hotel Hobart’s fascinating past. 

When you're ready for adventure, the very best of Tassie's capital is within easy walking distance. Stroll to the harbourfront, where Salamanca Market buzzes with tourists and locals every Saturday, or catch the ferry from Constitution Dock to MONA, Hobart's most eclectic art gallery - home to interactive exhibitions, fine dining and even a winery. At the end of each day, Vibe's impeccable hospitality, cosy Dreamcatcher beds and stunning fifth-floor heated pool are waiting to welcome you home.

title: Waterfront Hobart Escape with Tasmanian Wine & Gourmet Treats
description:
Treat yourself to a taste of Tasmania at Somerset on the Pier Hobart - a waterfront oasis where old-world charm meets modern comforts. Housed in a beautifully converted 1930's pier building, this Hobart icon boasts a collection of contemporary apartments that pay homage to the building's historic beginnings. Both spacious and stylish, each serviced apartment offers serene vistas of the surrounding mountainscape or river. With Salamanca Market and the MONA (Museum of Old and New Art) ferry on your doorstep, you'll be perfectly located to explore the very best of Hobart or to simply soak up the views with a glass of Tasmanian wine. Whether you're seeking a serene staycation on the shores of the Derwent or looking for the perfect place to base yourself for adventure, this is the ideal retreat for every traveller.

Your escape is complete with a welcome gift bag of delicious Tasmanian sweet and savoury treats and a bottle of local wine. Plus, indulge until the very last moment with leisurely 1pm late checkout.

**Relax with river views:** upgrade to a Premier Apartment and enjoy the luxury of your own private balcony with striking vistas across the River Derwent.

**Travelling with family?** Enjoy a spacious two-bedroom, two-bathroom set-up when you upgrade to a Family Apartment for two adults and two children (aged 11 years and under).

title: Family Friendly Hobart Escape - Two Kids Stay Free!
description: Discover the treasures of Hobart and enjoy the flexibility of a private apartment, staying at the RACV/RACT Hobart Apartment Hotel near the famous Salamanca Market. A bottle of Tasmanian red wine on arrival will provide a pleasant start to your escape, which also includes daily buffet breakfast, complimentary Wi-Fi and a guaranteed late check out of 12pm. Two kids (aged 12 years and under) stay free of charge on a sofa bed with daily breakfast.

title: Tassie Escape in the Heart of Hobart
description: Experience the lively harbour-side charms of Hobart with two nights at Mantra Collins Hotel, located minutes from famous Franklin Wharf and close to the city's main tourist attractions. Enjoy an automatic upgrade, daily a la carte breakfasts, a bottle of Tasmanian wine on arrival, late checkout and complimentary Wi-Fi.

title: Extended by Popular Demand: Hobart Glamour in the Heart of the City with Daily Breakfast & Valet Parking
description:
Back by popular demand, this is your gateway to Hobart's waterfront, nestled in the heart of the city. Nearby, you'll find charming Salamanca Place and the city’s buzzing markets, galleries and top-tier dining. Perched high above it all, each elegantly designed room and suite frames sweeping views of the city or harbour, adding a touch of glamour to each day.

Start your day with a breakfast at Core Restaurant and Bar, where fresh Tasmanian produce shines, or return later for a handcrafted cocktail on the rooftop at The Deck as the sun sets. Stay on track with your routine at the state-of-the-art fitness centre, or venture inland to explore a network of stunning mountain trails.

Enjoy VIP treatment with complimentary valet parking - a must-have perk for your stay in Hobart. Whether you're immersing yourself in the art at MONA or wandering through the heritage streets of Battery Point, this stylish city break is the ideal starting point for your Tasmanian adventure.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Hotel, an IHG Hotel

title: Hobart: One-Hour Mother's Day Photoshoot for up to Eight People
description:
Give the gift of lifelong memories for Mother's Day and say 'I love you,' with a one-hour professional photoshoot experience with Travelshoot, Australia's leading travel photography experts. You'll have the luxury of deciding where in Hobart you and your family will be photographed - maybe you'd like to get snapped in style at the famous Salamanca Market, by the wetlands of the Royal Tasmanian Botanical Gardens or by the shore. Be guided by your expert photographer on the day, as they capture a series of candid, natural and relaxed moments - including warm smiles and tender hugs shared between you and your loved ones.

This experience's great strength is its flexibility - bring up to eight guests, including infants and children of all ages, and decide on a time and place that suits you. You'll receive 30 edited digital images within seven days of your photoshoot; your captured memories to print, frame and hang.

title: Modern Escape in the Heart of Hobart
description:
Discover the treasures of Hobart from RACV Hobart Hotel, a modern property located in an unbeatable location in the heart of it all.

Fringed by wilderness, perched on a beautiful harbour and packed with exquisite adventures, it’s easy to fall in love with Hobart. Home to wine and cocktail bars, one-of-a-kind cafés, world-class restaurants, art galleries and picturesque cobblestoned streets, the treasured Tasmanian capital truly is a magical destination. Experience it all from RACV Hobart Hotel - only two blocks from the waterfront, the hotel boasts superb facilities and a collection of plush rooms and apartments that will be your launchpad for discovering all the city's sights, including MONA, Mount Wellington, the markets, the floating fish-and-chip shops and more.

title: Award-Winning Hobart Studio Stay
description:
You couldn’t ask for a better location from which to experience the cobblestoned charm of Hobart than the award-winning Salamanca Wharf Hotel. This five-star hotel is surrounded by one-of-a-kind cafés, relaxed bars, vibrant live music and art galleries, and sits just metres from Hobart’s waterfront, the historic Salamanca Place (home to the famous Salamanca Market) and Castray Esplanade.

The self-contained studios and apartments come equipped with everything you'll need for a comfortable stay, including fully equipped kitchenettes, Wi-Fi and free parking.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Guaranteed 12pm late checkout so you can make the most of your final day

**Want added luxury?** Upgrade to a spacious Premium One-Bedroom Apartment with a separate kitchen, living and dining area.

title: Waterfront Mövenpick City Break in the Heart of Hobart with Onsite Gourmet Dining
description:
Soak up the allure of Tasmania's capital from this sophisticated Mövenpick sanctuary ideally positioned in the heart of Hobart's vibrant waterfront precinct. Take this chance to discover Hobart's rich culture, history and lip-smacking cuisine as you explore the iconic Salamanca Market, stroll the harbour and admire the Royal Tasmanian Botanical Gardens.

Back at your hotel, unwind in your plush room and when hunger strikes, indulge in a culinary journey at the onsite Tesoro Modern Italian Restaurant sampling local dry-aged meats and house-made tiramisu. For art enthusiasts, the world-renowned Museum of Old and New Art is only a short ferry ride - or 20-minute drive - away and awaits exploration.

title: Heritage-Listed Rydges Hobart Stay within Minutes of Salamanca Wharf
description: Escape to Tasmania's historic capital with a stylish stay at the heritage-listed Rydges Hobart - a charming retreat in the trendy neighbourhood of North Hobart. Sneak away for a relaxing escape in a magical destination packed with world-class art, epicurean discoveries, one-of-a-kind cafés, indulgent wine and cocktail bars and picturesque cobblestone streets, all perched on the edge of a beautiful harbour. When you return after a day of exploring, dine at 1898 Restaurant and Bar, set within the historic main building with a fireplace and courtyard.
offer_address: 393 Argyle Street, North Hobart, Tasmania 7000, Australia

title: Hobart Waterfront Art Hotel with Onsite Dining & Cocktail Bar
description:
Australia’s first dedicated art hotel combines luxury hospitality and creative expression, housed in a historic jam factory on Hobart’s bustling waterfront. With exposed brick, steel beams and soaring ceilings, the building’s industrial character is elevated by contemporary details and an impressive art collection from Tasmanian creatives.

Perfectly positioned in the heart of Hobart, spend your days exploring the colonial-era streets, award-winning restaurants and the stunning riverside, or perhaps dive deeper into the hotel’s collection on their Art and History Tour. Indulge in Tasmania’s finest produce at Landscape Restaurant & Grill and cheers to your stay with a handcrafted cocktail at IXL Long Bar.

title: Hobart Waterfront Escape with Skyline-View Heated Indoor Pool
description: Experience the very best of Tasmania's capital with a stay in the heart of the thriving harbourfront city at Hotel Grand Chancellor Hobart, located on the postcard-perfect waterfront. Relax and enjoy the view before heading out to hop between cosy cafes, fabulous restaurants and lively bars. Return to the welcoming hotel and make the most of its world-class facilities, including a heated indoor pool with incredible skyline views.

title: Adults-Only Boutique Hobart Retreat with Spectacular Mount Wellington Views
description: Built in 1847, the Islington Hotel's historic charm and cosy vibes offer the perfect place to rejuvenate, surrounded by picture-perfect Mount Wellington views, precious artworks, crackling fires and sun-drenched terraces. After indulging in a decadent breakfast, experience the grandeur, natural beauty and charm of the capital city, home to a vibrant live music scene, dramatic art galleries and gourmet dining options.

title: Acclaimed Hobart Hotel on the Historic Macquarie Wharf with Waterfront Restaurant & Three Bars
description:
Experience a hotel that feels like a luxury cruise, not just a city stay, all within walking distance of Hobart’s best. Situated on the city’s most historic wharf, boasting timber panelling, sweeping windows and subtle reminders of its storied past, it’s impossible not to be wowed by the seaside splendour of the iconic MACq 01 Hotel.

After days of uncovering Hobart’s wonders, retreat to your designer room, each embodying the storied Tasmanian spirit through quirky artwork, raw materials and earthy tones. Later, savour freshly caught Tasmanian seafood at Old Wharf Restaurant, with a backdrop of the dazzling harbour, before a nightcap by The Lounge's open fire.

title: Hobart Waterfront Luxury Five Minutes from Salamanca with Nine Restaurants & Bars
description:
Experience the history, natural beauty and lively vibe of Hobart with a stay at Wrest Point. Delight in the breathtaking views of the Derwent River, Mount Wellington and the city from your elegant accommodation, before setting out to explore all that the capital has to offer, including Salamanca Market, historic Battery Point and the renowned Museum of Old and New Art (MONA).

You'll be spoilt for culinary choice with nine restaurants and bars onsite, including The Point Revolving Restaurant, perched on the 17th floor. When not eating or drinking, take dips in the indoor pool, or soak up the thrilling entertainment at the casino or Entertainment Centre.
offer_address: 410 Sandy Bay Rd, Hobart 7005, Tasmania, Australia

title: Stylish Central Hobart Stay Moments From Salamanca Markets
description: Experience the charm of Tasmania's capital with a central stay located in the heart of Hobart's bustling waterfront district. This contemporary hotel is within easy reach of the city's renowned Salamanca Market, historic Battery Point and the Tasmanian Museum and Art Gallery. Start each morning at Cafe Collins, before embracing all that the southern capital has to offer, including the Royal Botanic Gardens and the Museum of Old and New Art (MONA). Return each night to impeccable hospitality and cosy cloud-like beds.

title: Stylish City Break in the Heart of Hobart with Rooftop Bar
description: Escape to the heart of Hobart with a stay at Crowne Plaza Hobart, an IHG Hotel, masterfully positioned on Liverpool Street near a bustling collection of cafés, boutiques and historic theatres. Admire stunning views of mighty Mt. Wellington over espressotinis at rooftop bar The Deck or feast on grilled, market-fresh seafood at Core restaurant and bar, serving seasonal plates backed by Tasmania's succulent local produce - a shining example of what makes Hobart’s culinary culture so brilliant.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Hobart, an IHG Hotel

title: Stylish Vibe Hobart Stay Moments from the Harbour & Salamanca Market
description: Fall in love with the Apple Isle's many charms at Vibe Hotel Hobart, a unique property just a short walk from the harbour. With its towering, sophisticated exterior and sleek modern décor, you’d never guess that the historic building dates back to the 1930s, when it was better known as the Belvedere Ballroom. Stroll to the harbourfront, where Salamanca Market buzzes with tourists and locals every Saturday, or catch the ferry from Constitution Dock to MONA, Hobart's most eclectic art gallery - home to interactive exhibitions, fine dining and even a winery. At the end of each day, Vibe's impeccable hospitality and stunning fifth-floor heated pool are waiting to welcome you home.

title: Boutique Warehouse Stay in Hobart’s Vibrant Salamanca Place
description:
Tucked away inside original Georgian warehouses and spread across two buildings separated by a city block, Moss Hotel invites you to embrace the history and natural scenery of Tasmania. The hotel’s warehouse number 39, in the heart of Salamanca Place, puts you only steps from an array of dining and entertainment options, while at number 25 - located in a quieter spot, but still close to the action - privacy and intimacy reign supreme.

From this luxury springboard, you’ll be perfectly placed to immerse yourself in the local culture. Hop aboard one of the regular MONA ferries, enjoy alfresco dinners, pop open the finest Tasmanian wines, taste your way through Saturday's Salamanca Market - starting with a local scallop pie - and discover Tasmania’s spectacular scenery on one of the many nearby hiking trails.

title: Central Hobart Self-Contained Studios and Apartments Near Salamanca Place & St David's Park
description:
Experience the charm of Hobart with a stay at this ideally positioned escape between the city's vibrant waterfront and historic Battery Point. Spend relaxing hours in your spacious, self-contained apartment, complete with a kitchenette, comfortable living area and views of the city below. 

When you feel like stepping out, savour the finest Tasmanian produce at the nearby Salamanca Market, explore the captivating exhibits at the Museum of Old and New Art, or take a scenic drive to the stunning Mount Wellington.
location_description: Mantra One Sandy Bay Road Hobart
offer_address: 1 Sandy Bay Road, Hobart, Tasmania, 7000, Australia
